verbose_text: Secondly, immunohistochemical studies have revealed that the NLRP3 inflammasome is activated in plaque macrophages, while oxLDL modulates NLRP3 inflammasome activity in mouse macrophages and activates caspase-1.
evidence: NLRP3 inflammasome is activated in plaque macrophages              , while oxLDL modulates NLRP3 inflammasome activity in mouse macrophages and activates caspase-1
